data.name: Overlooking View
data.description: Reach the very top of Qingyun Peak.

data.name: The Remains of the Gale
data.description: Reach the top of the tower in Stormterror's Lair.

data.name: "Seeds of Stories, Brought By the Wind..."
data.description: Reach the nameless island northeast of Mondstadt.

data.name: Unswerving
data.description: Open the chest in the middle of the heart-shaped rock formation.

data.name: Initiating Warp Drive!
data.description: Pass through the time tunnel in the skies of Cape Oath.

data.name: Beloved of the Anemo Archon
data.description: Take a seat in the hands of the God Statue in Mondstadt.

data.name: The Best Sword in the Cemetery
data.description: Unlock the Tri-Seal of the Sword Cemetery.

data.name: Hidden Palace of Guizang Formula
data.description: Follow in the footsteps of immortals, and unlock the Domain's door.

data.name: Cecilia Garden
data.description: Return the Seelie to their rightful places and unlock the entrance to a Domain in Wolvendom.

data.name: Hidden Palace of Zhou Formula
data.description: Follow the Seelie and light the torches to unlock the entrance to a domain in Wuwang Hill.

data.name: "If you put your heart into it..."
data.description: Cook 1 suspicious-tasting dish.

data.name: "...Anyone can be a gourmet."
data.description: Cook 10 suspicious-tasting dishes.

data.name: Boared to Death
data.description: Be defeated by a wild boar.

data.name: Golden Gliding License
data.description: Glide a long, long distance in one go.

data.name: It's the Same As Having Wings
data.description: Glide continuously for over 80s.

data.name: Quick As Lightning
data.description: Sprint continuously (or use an alternative sprint) for over 15s.

data.name: Friends the World Over
data.description: Meet all sorts of people during your adventure.

data.name: Megastar in Mondstadt
data.description: Reach Reputation Lv. 8 in Mondstadt.

data.name: Legend in Liyue
data.description: Reach Reputation Lv. 8 in Liyue.

data.name: Illustrious in Inazuma
data.description: Reach Reputation Lv. 8 in Inazuma.

data.name: QUEST CLEAR
data.description: Complete 10/20/30 Bounties.

data.name: Hero-in-Training
data.description: Complete 10/20/30 Requests.

data.name: QUEST FAILED
data.description: Lost track of a Bounty target.

data.name: The Bleak Midwinter
data.description: Succumb to Sheer Cold...

data.name: Priest, Princess, and Scribe
data.description: Claim the treasure of the Entombed City.

data.name: Prodigal Son's Return
data.description: Follow the path of one of the members of the long-lost investigation team to where they embarked on their journey home.

data.name: Snow-Stored History
data.description: Discover the fate of a long-lost investigation team that once explored Dragonspine.

data.name: Glacial Steel
data.description: Obtain an ancient weapon made of Starsilver.

data.name: Futile Endeavor
data.description: Discover the remains of many ruin machines.

data.name: Untellable Tale
data.description: Make an unexpected friend in an unexpected location.

data.name: Towering Achievement
data.description: Reach the summit of Dragonspine.

data.name: Winter Wonderland
data.description: Discover a Cryo Crystalfly beneath a snow pile.

data.name: The Hunter Becomes the Hunted
data.description: Be defeated by The Great Snowboar King.

data.name: Chill Out!
data.description: Defeat The Great Snowboar King while the latter is in berserker mode.

data.name: Glutton for Goulash
data.description: Learn to make Goulash.

data.name: Wrath of the Gods
data.description: Get struck by lightning.

data.name: Sky High
data.description: Climb the Skyfrost Nail after it has been restored.

data.name: Transmutation Nuclide
data.description: Use the Parametric Transformer to complete one material transmutation.

data.name: ...You could hear Paimon all along, couldn't you?
data.description: Even Paimon gets tired sometimes.

data.name: Yo-Ho-Ho, and a Bottle of Dandelion Wine
data.description: Climb aboard your Waverider.

data.name: Mighty and Illuminated Wave Rider
data.description: Continuously sail your Waverider for a certain period of time.

data.name: Nice Boat!
data.description: Switch Waveriders with another player.

data.name: ...And Her Name Is the Mary Celeste
data.description: Suffer the destruction of your Waverider...

data.name: Déjà Vu!
data.description: Continuously sail your Waverider at high speeds for a certain period of time.

data.name: Yamada Go's Wooden Mallet
data.description: See through the illusions of the Tanuki several times.

data.name: "Kujirai Art, Temari Jutsu"
data.description: Play a game of Temari with Kujirai

data.name: Paimon's Lucky Day!
data.description: Draw a "Great Fortune" fortune slip at the Grand Narukami Shrine.

data.name: Just My Luck...
data.description: Draw a "Great Curse" fortune slip at the Grand Narukami Shrine.

data.name: Underground... Overrated?
data.description: Sometimes, the real treasure is the things you learn along the way.

data.name: SHUUMATSU GAIDEN
data.description: Get caught up in the fight between the Shuumatsuban and the Fatui...

data.name: Iwakura Out
data.description: Witness the end of the Iwakura Clan.

data.name: Who Let the Dogs Out
data.description: Set Toratarou free.

data.name: You Can't Help Your Feelings
data.description: Help Hiromi resolve his angst.

data.name: They Shall Not Grow Old
data.description: Pay your respects to the deceased.

data.name: Oh, the Humanity!
data.description: Witness the fate of the Samurai.

data.name: A Hollow Soul
data.description: Find Washizu's lost possessions.

data.name: Rise and Shrine
data.description: Find all the shrines on Yashiori Island.

data.name: ...And I Would Walk 3,000 More
data.description: Find Chouji on Tatarasuna and Narukami Island.

data.name: A Doctor's Odyssey
data.description: Find out what happened to Yasumoto.

data.name: Knock Knock
data.description: Disable the containment dome surrounding the Mikage Furnace.

data.name: Kannazuka Battle Plan
data.description: Defeat the revived Electro Hypostasis.

data.name: Why We Fight
data.description: Help Masanori return to his senses.

data.name: Oowazamono
data.description: Defeat Masanori with ease.

data.name: Second Blooming
data.description: Obtain Hanayama Kaoru's gift.

data.name: Thank You, Come Again
data.description: Obtain the grand prize from Takashi's chests.

data.name: Shocking… Positively Shocking
data.description: Get struck down by Balethunder…

data.name: Jackpot
data.description: Use the Kamuijima Cannon to reveal a treasure trove.

data.name: Blade of Tatara
data.description: Obtain the diagram of a certain weapon from the past.

data.name: Rest in Peace
data.description: End the wrath of 10 deceased samurai.

data.name: "That's What They Call a Getaway!"
data.description: Allow a struggling fish to get off the hook.

data.name: "Oh, so That's How You Fish..."
data.description: Scare the fish away when casting your rod.

data.name: As You Wish
data.description: Have your fortune told 5 times by Granny Komaki while obtaining an ideal result.

data.name: A Mermaid's Tale
data.description: Help Kumi with her problem.

data.name: A Distant Sea Shepherd's Treasure
data.description: Gain the most valued treasure of a great pirate from the ramblings of drunkards.

data.name: Long John Silver
data.description: Find all of Rinzou's buried treasure.

data.name: Today, This Seal — Tomorrow, Watatsumi Island!
data.description: Break the seal over the Electro Archon's shrine.

data.name: Palace in a Pool
data.description: Unlock "Palace in a Pool"

data.name: The Stranding of the Beagle
data.description: Explore Watatsumi Island, following in the footsteps of an unknown researcher.

data.name: "I am a cat named Neko."
data.description: Meet Neko, the "Provisional Head Priestess of the Asase Shrine."

data.name: Cat in the Clouds
data.description: Witness a "good thing" come lately together with Neko, the "Provisional Head Priestess of the Asase Shrine."

data.name: A Cat's Gift
data.description: Feed the kittens on Seirai Island and gain their affection.

data.name: It Has to Be Treasure
data.description: "I already told you, it's just a picture!"

data.name: On the Other Side of Homesickness
data.description: Help Oda Tarou take four pictures of Seirai Island.

data.name: This and That...
data.description: ... Try connecting them?

data.name: Davy Jones' Locker
data.description: Unlock all the mechanisms onboard the "Seiraimaru."

data.name: Sea of Puzzles
data.description: Unlock one series of mechanisms on Seirai Island

data.name: Great Amakumo Peak
data.description: Unlock the mechanism beneath Amakumo Peak

data.name: Traverse the Fog Door
data.description: Get used to Tsurumi Island's odd weather.

data.name: Nihil Sub Caligine Novum
data.description: Seems like you're back to square one...

data.name: White's Illusion
data.description: Encounter the illusions of the ancient past

data.name: "Lovely Sights, Further Than the Eye Can See"
data.description: Bid farewell to your boatman.

data.name: A Tale of Two Cities
data.description: Even Tsurumi Island seems to be built atop the wreckage of ancient ruins.

data.name: "My Life as an Adventurer"
data.description: Help Roald to complete his adventure diary.

data.name: Light Up the Fog
data.description: Light up all the Stormstones on the Autake Plains.

data.name: "P—Paimon ate it..."
data.description: Have the Maushiro that you got go missing.

data.name: Guessing Game
data.description: From an even more distant past to the present day...

data.name: Thunderbird's Lineage
data.description: Complete all the statue challenges.

data.name: Seven Letters
data.description: Try to decipher the Ishine Script.

data.name: Moshiri Kara
data.description: Unlock Moshiri Kara

data.name: Across the Misty River
data.description: You finally reach the far side of the Sea of Fog...

data.name: "Trying to Tame Me?"
data.description: Use the Omni-Ubiquity Net item to capture 1 wild animal.

data.name: Natural Born Hunter
data.description: Use the Omni-Ubiquity Net item to capture 30 wild animal.

data.name: Zoo Tycoon
data.description: Use the Omni-Ubiquity Net item to capture 100 wild animal.

data.name: "Not Flyin' Away This Time!"
data.description: Use the Omni-Ubiquity Net item to capture 1 Crystalfly.

data.name: The Net Closes In
data.description: Use the Omni-Ubiquity Net item to capture 1 Finch.

data.name: N-Thousand Leagues Under the Sea
data.description: Enter Enkanomiya.

data.name: Flowing Sunfire, Also Known as Marishi
data.description: Unlock the secret at the Sunfire Gate.

data.name: Of Sun and Moon
data.description: Switch between Whitenight and Evernight once.

data.name: "Extensive And Meticulous"
data.description: Receive the Jibashiri's acknowledgment.

data.name: "The Eel in Winter Sought"
data.description: Receive the Jibashiri's acknowledgment.

data.name: "Unmatched Throughout Tokoyo"
data.description: Receive the Jibashiri's acknowledgment.

data.name: "Maybe Get Yourself a More Social Hobby..."
data.description: Complete Date's labyrinth challenge.

data.name: "If Tokoyo Ookami Knew of This..."
data.description: Return all the library books, and...

data.name: "What Difference Does This Make?"
data.description: Sit at every single special spot.

data.name: The Children of God Shall Dance
data.description: Speak to all the Phaethon afterimages.

data.name: Light and Dark, Dusk and Dawn
data.description: Head to the top of the Dainichi Mikoshi.

data.name: Step Right Up!
data.description: Complete the archery challenge.

data.name: The Ill-Starred Legacy of Iwakura
data.description: Return the blade of the Iwakura Master.

data.name: One Key for Each Lock
data.description: Find all the Key Sigils.

data.name: It's Yesterday Once More
data.description: Active 10/30/60 tunes in the Serenitea Pot using the Euphonium Unbound furnishing series.

data.name: The Lost Valley
data.description: Unlock The Lost Valley.

data.name: The Chasm Mining Records
data.description: Read all text fragments related to mining in The Chasm.

data.name: People of the Valley of Life
data.description: Find the shriveled seed and do not eat it rashly.

data.name: Crede Tenebrae
data.description: Open the secret chamber in the ruins.

data.name: The Nine-Word Rumor
data.description: Find all the secret messages.

data.name: Den of Thieves
data.description: Find the Treasure Hoarder stash.

data.name: Ding Ding Ding, We Have a Winner! Again!
data.description: Get three treasure chests and pass Old Chou's treasure hunt game.

data.name: Of the Human Heart Many Essays Written
data.description: Complete all ecological surveys and gain the recommendation letter from Khedive.

data.name: If Not Us, Then Who?
data.description: Collect the letters of the Fatui in The Chasm.

data.name: Maintain Safety Distance
data.description: Use the Safe Blasting Mechanism 2156 to clear the path ahead.

data.name: Birth Pains of the Dark Fog
data.description: Defeat the thing that emerged from the dark fog.

data.name: The Alchemistake
data.description: Rescue Clitopho

data.name: Valor's Afterglow
data.description: Where lies the true meaning of adventure?

data.name: Not for Long-Term Consumption
data.description: Find Uncle He, the missing miner, in The Chasm.

data.name: The Mushrooms That Asks Too Much
data.description: Complete Xamaran's commission in The Chasm.

data.name: The Millelith Shall Never Be Moved
data.description: Collect all the offerings the Millelith left behind and obtain the treasure.

data.name: Jack of No Trades
data.description: Get to know the story of Tang Wuchou, hero of the cliffs.

data.name: Well Done, Stierlitz!
data.description: Help Yanbo complete the Millelith's mission.

data.name: Yet the Darkness Did Not Overcome It...
data.description: Use the Lumenstone's Blooming Light to clear the crystallized darkness on an Oozing Concretion for the first time.

data.name: "...Smells Like Asphalt."
data.description: Be brought down by the contaminants within the black mud for the first time.

data.name: "All We Need Is Some Firewood and Some Vinegar..."
data.description: There is not just one secret path to the surface.

data.name: The Tome of Taliesin
data.description: Obtain Taliesin's gift.

data.name: Light Up the Dark
data.description: Send forth some light.

data.name: Juggernaut
data.description: Crush all of a Geo Hypostasis' Rock Pillars of Revival before it can be revived.

data.name: The PRISM Program
data.description: Break all of an Electro Hypostasis' Revival Prisms before it can be revived.

data.name: "That's one big Crystalfly"
data.description: Absorb all of an Anemo Hypostasis' Wind Crystals before it can be revived.

data.name: "...Not indicative of final product"
data.description: Defeat an Anemo Hypostasis that has undergone 4 types of Elemental Conversions.

data.name: The Bigger They Are...
data.description: Paralyze a Ruin Guard by attacking its weak point.

data.name: Through Pass
data.description: Knock a Pyro Slime out of the hands of a Hilichurl Grenadier.

data.name: Dolorous Stroke
data.description: Defeat an opponent by Shattering the ice they are trapped in.

data.name: Hilichurl Champion
data.description: Defeat a Stonehide Lawachurl before its Infused Form can expire.

data.name: Bon Appétit
data.description: Have 4 party members in the Full state at the same time.

data.name: Purveyor of Punishment
data.description: Deal over 5,000/​20,000/​50,000 CRIT DMG.

data.name: Fantastic Four
data.description: Complete a Domain using 4 characters of the same Elemental Type.

data.name: "Take That, You Overblown Mist Flower!"
data.description: Defeat a Cryo Regisvine without destroying its corolla weak point.

data.name: "That Was Blooming Hot"
data.description: Defeat a Pyro Regisvine without destroying its corolla weak point.

data.name: Outlander Vs. Outlander
data.description: Defeat Childe without any party member being marked and then hit by his follow-up attack.

data.name: Penalty
data.description: There are places where one cannot simply dig Pyro Slimes out of the ground...

data.name: Force Field Erosion
data.description: Destroy the Electro Hypostasis' barrier.

data.name: "...Lizard-Spock"
data.description: Have one character get hit by all three parts of the rock-paper-scissors attack consecutively.

data.name: A House Ill-Founded
data.description: Cause the same Geo Hypostasis to fall three times by destroying the Basalt Column that it is on.

data.name: None Stand Secure
data.description: Force the Geo Hypostasis into its revival state without destroying any Basalt Columns.

data.name: Back With The Wind
data.description: Absorb at least 10 Elemental Orbs created by the Anemo Hypostasis in a single battle.

data.name: Core Meltdown
data.description: Destroy the Blazing Seed created by a Pyro Regisvine.

data.name: Knockout
data.description: Destroy a Cryo Regisvine's corolla weak point while it is performing its rotary spray attack.

data.name: "...Till Debt Do Us Part"
data.description: Defeat a Fatui Agent while they are in their stealth mode.

data.name: "Melting... Away..."
data.description: Defeat a Cryo Cicin Mage while all her Cryo Cicins are currently active.

data.name: And You Call Yourself One of the Four Winds
data.description: Defeat an Anemoboxer Vanguard after having triggered all of their Elemental Absorptions.

data.name: Touch and Go
data.description: Use a shield to counter a Geovishap's charging attack.

data.name: Deflection!
data.description: Use a shield to counter a Primo Geovishap's Primordial Shower attack.

data.name: You Can Have Those Back!
data.description: Use a shield of a matching type (or a Geo shield) to counter a Primo Geovishap's Primordial Shower attack and deal immense DMG.

data.name: Sternest of Souls
data.description: Defeat Azhdaha in all its forms.

data.name: "...A Single Night's Work"
data.description: Defeat a Cryo Hypostasis that is in a weakened state.

data.name: "Knee-Deep Snow..."
data.description: Defeat a Cryo Hypostasis that has revived three times.

data.name: If I Run Fast Enough…
data.description: Defeat a Maguu Kenki without being hit by its phantom's attacks.

data.name: In This Solemn Matter Let No One Interfere!
data.description: Defeat a Maguu Kenki without triggering its "Oushi no Omote" parry.

data.name: Fine, I'll Do It Myself
data.description: Defeat a Primo Geovishap without reflecting its Primordial Shower.

data.name: Burned Yourself, Did You?
data.description: Defeat a Pyro Hypostasis that has reignited twice.

data.name: Smells like Animal Spirit!
data.description: Defeat a Pyro Hypostasis after being hit by its mimetic 3-hit combo.

data.name: Core Breakthrough
data.description: Defeat a Perpetual Mechanical Array after paralyzing all 4 types of its Ruin Sentinels.

data.name: Could All Uninvolved Machinery Please Leave Immediately?
data.description: Defeat the Perpetual Mechanical Array without defeating any of its Ruin Sentinels.

data.name: Fight Fire With Fire
data.description: Defeat a Kairagi: Fiery Might while their weapon is infused with Pyro.

data.name: Ride the Lightning
data.description: Defeat a Kairagi: Dancing Thunder while their weapon is infused with Electro.

data.name: I Hear Thunder..
data.description: Be struck by the lightning called down by a Crackling Axe Mitachurl...

data.name: Dry Clean
data.description: Defeat the Hydro Hypostasis without destroying a single one of its Water Droplets (except when it is restoring HP.)

data.name: Bio-Oceanic Weapon
data.description: Be hit by a certain animal created by the Hydro Hypostasis...

data.name: Love and Non-Communication
data.description: Defeat a Thunder Manifestation without ever being locked onto.

data.name: Thunder Fall
data.description: Defeat a Thunder Manifestation while it is in flight.

data.name: Icy Rivers, Crimson Witch
data.description: Defeat Signora without destroying either her Hearts of Flame or Eyes of Frost.

data.name: Inugami's End
data.description: Destroy two Rifthound Skulls within a short time.

data.name: Hard Landing
data.description: Bring a climbing Bathysmal Vishap down.

data.name: Impeccable Judgement
data.description: Only shoot down your real opponent...

data.name: Beware of Angry Dog
data.description: Defeat a roaring Rifthound.

data.name: Basically Harmless
data.description: Defeat a Specter that has not accumulated any Fury.

data.name: Overflowing Light
data.description: Destroy 2 Oozing Concretions with 1 Blooming Light during a battle against the Ruin Serpent.

data.name: The End of the Beginning
data.description: Complete the Mondstadt Archon Quests.

data.name: The Outlander Who Caught the Wind
data.description: Complete "The Outlander Who Caught the Wind."

data.name: For a Tomorrow Without Tears
data.description: Complete "For a Tomorrow Without Tears."

data.name: Song of the Dragon and Freedom
data.description: Complete "Song of the Dragon and Freedom."

data.name: Let the Wind Lead
data.description: Obtain the power of Anemo.

data.name: ...Or a New Storm?
data.description: Banish the dragon attacking Mondstadt.

data.name: Knighthood Excellence
data.description: Become an Honorary Knight of Favonius.

data.name: Knights and their Knotty Issues
data.description: Fail to borrow the Holy Relic... but learn of the Knights' dilemma.

data.name: Winds Change Their Course
data.description: Be rescued by Dvalin.

data.name: Of the Land Amidst Monoliths
data.description: Complete "Of the Land Amidst Monoliths"

data.name: Farewell, Archaic Lord
data.description: Complete "Farewell, Archaic Lord."

data.name: Outlandish Behavior
data.description: Be rescued by an outsider at the "tourist spot that locals don't go to."

data.name: Silly-Billy Churlish Ghoul
data.description: Agree to play with Dusky Ming.

data.name: That Smells Divine
data.description: Figure out which perfume Rex Lapis is fond of.

data.name: It's Bigger on the Inside
data.description: Clean Madame Ping's teapot.

data.name: Ticked, Tacked, and Towed
data.description: Commission others to finish your work, unfettered by such things as Mora.

data.name: Respecting Cultural Heritage
data.description: You failed to find the Cocogoat... but manage to repair a mechanism.

data.name: The Long Goodbye
data.description: Prepare everything necessary for the Rite of Parting.

data.name: Icing on the Slime
data.description: Create a box of lovely, jubbly Sugar-Frosted Slimes.

data.name: Sky's the Limit
data.description: Reach Liyue's "mansion in the sky".

data.name: Lily Loves Music
data.description: Sing a song of Mondstadt to the Glaze Lilies...

data.name: I'll Let You Off... This Time
data.description: Defeat Childe.

data.name: Derailed
data.description: Defeat the Overlord of the Vortex.

data.name: Final Farewell
data.description: Take part in the Rite of Parting.

data.name: A New Star Approaches
data.description: Complete "A New Star Approaches".

data.name: Pirates! Argh!
data.description: Play a game of pirates with Little Lulu, Little Fei, and Little Meng.

data.name: Love Is All Around
data.description: In "Good Sign," help Zhihua find 5 signs that romance is coming his way.

data.name: A Nourishing Friendship
data.description: Complete "Fishing Jiangxue" and "Yanxiao's Dilemma."

data.name: For the Love of Godwin
data.description: Finish "Whispers in the Wind" 5 times.

data.name: Level Up
data.description: Help Huai'an repair Wangshu Inn's broken bridge.

data.name: Beginner's Luck
data.description: Select the highest-value jade on your first try.

data.name: Taking Responsibility for Your Actions
data.description: Apologize to Timmie.

data.name: Making Do
data.description: Only bring materials for a training dummy to Herman.

data.name: "Dear Daddy..."
data.description: Hear Timmie's story.

data.name: Marvelous Medicine
data.description: Cure Anna's illness.

data.name: In the Name of Favonius
data.description: Witness Jilliana's tale.

data.name: Scholarly Pretensions
data.description: Complete "The Lost Relic" and "A Little Raid."

data.name: Poet Vs. Paycheck
data.description: Complete "So-called Work" and receive Linling's poetry anthology.

data.name: All's Well That Ends Well
data.description: Complete the quest "For Old Time's Sake".

data.name: This Novel Is Amazing!
data.description: Steal a peek at Chang the Ninth's draft manuscript.

data.name: Open to Interpretation
data.description: Ruin 4 signs of an imminent romance.

data.name: Get Your Own Emergency Food!
data.description: Consume the food during "Food Delivery"...?

data.name: Hidden in Plain Sight
data.description: Help Sango and Ryuuji solve the case.

data.name: Is There But One Truth...?
data.description: Witness Ryuuji's tale.

data.name: Liyue Ichiban
data.description: Heal Tang Wen with some delicious dishes.

data.name: Boom Shaka-Laka, More Boom-Shaka-Laka
data.description: Consult Xiangling regarding special cooking methods

data.name: Meal For Two
data.description: Help both Xudong and Kamei Munehisa make a dish once.

data.name: A Question of Diet
data.description: Help Parvaneh proofread all the recipes.

data.name: Samurice
data.description: Help Kamei Munehisa collect ingredients from the camps on either side.

data.name: "Sorry for the Trouble!"
data.description: Receive the complaint that Konda Densuke lodges in "Post-Sale Service."

data.name: Samurai Gourmet
data.description: Witness Kamei Munehisa's induction into the Gourmet Supremos.

data.name: Hello...! Anyone in here...?
data.description: Discover a secret passageway in Ritou.

data.name: You Should Start A Doushin Dojo
data.description: Help Asakura train 5 times.

data.name: Temari for Life
data.description: Have another player join a game of Temari that you are hosting.

data.name: "The Seventh Samurai"
data.description: Help Xavier finish his film.

data.name: For the Future of Narukami...
data.description: Return the wards needed for the Cleansing Ritual.

data.name: Editorial Opinion
data.description: Help Shigeru and Junkichi return to the right artist path.

data.name: Guess Who?
data.description: Find out who Zhenyu really is.

data.name: Her and Her Cat
data.description: Follow Neko up Mt. Yougou to find "Hibiki"'s trail.

data.name: Nothing to Lose But Time
data.description: Unlock the secrets of two sundials.

data.name: Interview with a Bygone God
data.description: Hear the story of a bygone deity.

data.name: Crouching Dragon, Hidden Chi
data.description: Learn about the tale of the Chi.

data.name: Scourge of the Battlefield
data.description: Fetch a good price for a treasure found in an ancient ruin...

data.name: Shadow Over Luhua Pool
data.description: Help Vermeer get the scenery of his dreams.

data.name: Ready Player Zero
data.description: Play a simple game with Childish Jiang.

data.name: Trees Should Blend Their Roots and Shade, For That Is Where the Home is Made
data.description: Witness the story of Yuan Hong's household.

data.name: Gears of Destiny
data.description: Complete the quest "Bough Keeper: Dainsleif".

data.name: The Bandit, the Lunatic, and the Pitch-Black Enigma
data.description: Uncover the Grand Thief's fate.

data.name: Where Fate Comes to a Crossroads
data.description: Escape the eerie ruins.

data.name: Sneering at the Power of the Gods
data.description: Learn of the "Loom of Fate"...

data.name: Silence, You Raving Lunatic

data.name: Hiiragi Sanjuuro
data.description: Escort the goods successfully and leave Ritou.

data.description: Officially make acquaintance of the young lady of the Kamisato Clan.

data.description: Rescue Masakatsu successfully.

data.description: Become the target of the Vision Hunt Decree.

data.description: Find the person behind the distribution of the Delusions.

data.description: Set off fireworks to distract the guards.

data.name: Duel Before the Throne
data.description: Emerge victorious in the duel before the throne.

data.name: Their Wishes
data.description: Bring all the wishes upon the Statue of the Omnipresent God to fruition.

data.name: Omnipresence Over Mortals

data.name: Well, At Least It Ended
data.description: Hear Junkichi out as he puts his story together.

data.name: "All is Well"
data.description: Help Wang Ping'an renovate Pervases' temple.

data.name: Anna's Adventures
data.description: Help Anna become an adventurer.

data.name: Prelude to the Journey
data.description: A young man is about to embark on a long journey...

data.name: Rise of the Jade Chamber
data.description: Complete the reconstruction of the Jade Chamber.

data.name: Majesty of the Deep
data.description: Defeat Beisht, Avenger of the Vortex.

data.name: A Former Dream
data.description: Witness the truth of the village's history.

data.name: The Crane Returns on the Wind
data.description: Complete "The Crane Returns on the Wind."

data.name: When One Gazes Into the Abyss...
data.description: Though you are reunited with Dain, the Abyss is watching...

data.name: The Will to Live and the Depths of Lamentation
data.description: Defeat the Abyss Herald.

data.name: May Glory Go With You
data.description: Complete "Requiem of the Echoing Depths"

data.description: Break through the obstacles and meet up with Xiao in "Perilous Trail."

data.name: Layers of Fear
data.description: Escape the mysterious space at the very bottom of The Chasm successfully.

data.name: Of Heart and Soul
data.description: Complete "Perilous Trail."

data.name: Fantastic Voyage: Prologue
data.description: Complete "Fantastic Voyage" and unlock all endings.

data.name: Archaic Lord of Lightning and Blitz
data.description: Witness the awesome meteorological power of Bennett's phenomenally bad luck.

data.name: The Power of Luck
data.description: Activate the Mechanisms and obtain the treasure without making any mistakes.

data.name: Evil Is Banished
data.description: Complete "Signs of Evil" and unlock all endings.

data.name: Behold, Mine Evil-Espying Eye!
data.description: Correctly interpret all clues.

data.description: Make a popsicle using the wrong recipe and provoke Chongyun's Pure-Yang spirit.

data.name: An Idol's Last Line of Defense
data.description: Successfully persuade Albert and Barbara's other fans to leave.

data.description: Complete "Chivalric Training" and unlock all endings.

data.description: Help Noelle discover the source of her strength.

data.description: Read Noelle's study notes.

data.description: Draw all fortune slips at the Grand Narukami Shrine.

data.description: Keep an opponent Frozen for over 10s (x1/5/10).

data.description: Trigger Cryo, Hydro, Pyro and Electro Swirl Reactions at least once each within 2s (x1/5/10).

data.description: Freeze 4 opponents within 2s (x1/5/10).

data.description: Defeat 4 opponents with Superconduct within 2s (x1/5/10).

data.description: Defeat 4 opponents with Overloaded within 2s (x1/5/10).

data.description: Defeat 4 opponents with Melt within 2s (x1/5/10).

data.name: A Little Less Shocking Than Love at First Sight
data.description: Defeat 4 opponents with Electro-Charged within 2s (x1/5/10).

data.name: Nothing Special, Just Practice
data.description: Hit a falcon mid-flight with your bow.

data.name: Master Sniper
data.description: Strike an opponent's weak point from afar with an Aimed Shot.

data.name: Der Freischütz
data.description: Strike an opponent's weak point from extremely far away with an Aimed Shot.

data.description: Shatter the Geo Crystal Shield of a Large Geo Slime.

data.description: Break an Electro Cicin Mage's shield.

data.name: Rhythm Tengoku
data.description: Stop an Abyss Mage from regenerating its shield.

data.description: Set a Wooden Shieldwall Mitachurl's shield on fire.

data.name: Hydro Hunter
data.description: Defeat every type of Hydro Mimic that an Oceanid can summon.

data.description: Defeat an Oceanid without being hit by water bombs left behind by certain Hydro Mimics.

data.name: ...Well, That Was Strange
data.description: Defeat the Unusual Hilichurl 1/20/50 time(s).

data.name: Extreme Gardening
data.description: Paralyze a Cryo Regisvine by attacking its corolla.

data.name: Gardener Extraordinaire
data.description: Paralyze a Pyro Regisvine by attacking its corolla.

data.name: Geronimo!
data.description: Hit an opponent with a Plunging Attack after plunging for more than 5 seconds.

data.name: Vicious Circle
data.description: Unleash 5 Elemental Bursts within 15 seconds.

data.name: Shield Me From the World
data.description: Have a single character be protected by 3 different types of shield at once.

data.name: Turnover
data.description: Knock a Cryo Slime out of the hands of a Cryo Hilichurl Grenadier.

data.name: Tear Down This Wall!
data.description: Destroy an Ice Shieldwall Mitachurl's shield.

data.description: Defeat a Cryo Samachurl before it is able to create an ice pillar.

data.name: ...The Harder They Fall
data.description: Destroy a Cryo Samachurl's ice pillar.

data.name: Chilly-Churl
data.description: Defeat a Frostarm Lawachurl before its Infused Form can expire.

data.name: "Rosebud..."
data.description: Break a Cryo Cicin Mage's shield.

data.name: Assassin of Kings
data.description: Defeat the true ruler of Dragonspine?

data.name: David and Goliath
data.description: Paralyze a Ruin Grader by attacking its weak point.

data.name: ...Geovishap, Solarvishap, Lunarvishap...
data.description: Defeat the Geovishap in all of its elemental forms.

data.description: Defeat the Primo Geovishap in all of its elemental forms.

data.name: Puppet Show-Off
data.description: Defeat the Maguu Kenki while he is taunting you.

data.name: Totaled Totem
data.description: Defeat an Electro Samachurl with no lightning totem on the field.

data.name: Did My Hand Fall From My Wrist?
data.description: Defeat a Thunderhelm Lawachurl while in an enhanced state.

data.name: I'll Skip the Spa, Thanks
data.description: Defeat a Mirror Maiden without being trapped by its Water Prison.

data.name: It's Quiet... Too Quiet...
data.description: Defeat the Pyro Hypostasis after it enters its extinguished state only once

data.name: The Battle of Narukami Island
data.description: Defeat the Perpetual Mechanical Array in its weakened state.

data.name: The Finishing Touch
data.description: Defeat Azhdaha without ever having gained a shield.

data.name: Salt for My Foes, and Water for Me
data.description: Obtain at least three healing orbs fired from the "water droplets" during the Hydro Hypostasis fight.

data.description: Stop the Hydro Hypostasis from reviving itself without destroying any of the "water droplets" by placing obstacles or repelling them.

data.name: Moment of Destruction
data.description: Defeat Signora without using any Crimson Lotus Moths.

data.name: Electric Escape
data.description: Defeat a Thunder Manifestation without being hit by its homing thunder cage attack.

data.name: Radio Silence
data.description: Get locked on by the Thunder Manifestation before you can attack it.

data.name: Swimming Prohibited
data.description: Defeat the Bathysmal Vishap Herd without allowing them to dive into the water.

data.name: Death Proof
data.description: Dodge one entire round of the Baleful Vajra's destructive waves during one battle with Magatsu Mitake Narukami no Mikoto.

data.description: Destroy Oozing Concretions to paralyze the Ruin Serpent while it is gathering energy.

data.name: Thunder is Forever
data.category: The Chronicles of the Sea of Fog

data.name: Amateurs Hammer Nails Into Hooks
data.description: Catch your first fish.

data.name: "Do you need a fishtank to go with that?"
data.description: Catch your first Ornamental Fish.

data.name: Yon Mirror'd Moon, Broken
data.description: Catch a fish that only comes out at night for the first time.

data.name: Ding Ding Ding!
data.description: Catch 100/500/2000 fish successfully.

data.name: "Call Me Ishmael."
data.description: Catch one fish in another player's world.

data.name: Fishy Motive
data.description: Buy a fishing rod from the Fishing Association.

data.name: Into the Waters
data.description: Successfully make 20 Bait.

data.name: A Right Proper Angler
data.description: Unlock 20 fish Archive entries.

data.name: Intermission
data.description: Catch a scattered page of a book while fishing in Inazuma.

data.name: Stabilizer
data.description: Catch fish successfully 10 times while always staying inside the Ideal Tension Zone.

data.name: "...You Do Not Know the Night..."
data.description: Light up the Enkanomiya map.

data.name: The Highest Authority in the Land
data.description: Unlock all Teleport Waypoints in Enkanomiya.

data.description: Follow 6/15/30 Seelie in Enkanomiya to their Seelie Courts.

data.name: Hesperus' Boons
data.description: Open 40/80/160 Chests in Enkanomiya.

data.name: Kairos' Constancy
data.description: Complete 3/6/12 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Enkanomiya.

data.name: Fire Rat's Robe, Dragon-Head Pearl, Sacred Offering Bowl, and...
data.description: Obtain the coral branch that Tsukuyo requested.

data.name: Chasm Conqueror

data.name: Perilous Plunge

data.name: Into the Depths
data.description: Unlock all Teleport Waypoints in The Chasm and its Underground Mines.

data.name: Chasm Treasure Hunter

data.name: Chasm Adventurer

data.name: Arch-Illuminator
data.description: Enhance the Lumenstone Adjuvant to its highest possible level.

data.name: "When the Seal Is Broken..."
data.description: Remove the obstacles to your entry into the mines.

data.name: Exploration Underway
data.description: Complete the exploration commission from the Ministry of Civil Affairs.
